Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near California/Wellington
ShortDescription: 94 California buses temp. rerouted NB: California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell; SB: Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near California/Wellington

Northbound buses will operate via California, Diversey, Western, Belmont, & Rockwell

Southbound buses will operate via Rockwell, Addison, Western, Belmont, & California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Lavergne
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses temp. rerouted SB Laramie, Lexington, Cicero, and Flournoy; NB Flournoy and Laramie: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harrison/Lavergne due to street blockage near Harrison/Lavergne.

Southbound buses will operate via  Laramie, Lexington, Cicero and Flournoy including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Flournoy and Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Lavergne
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Laramie, Jackson, Cicero and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Laramie, Jackson, Cicero and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Lavergne.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Homan/Washington
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses temp. rerouted SB: Homan, Franklin, Kedzie, Madison and Homan; NB: Homan, Warren, Kedzie, Franklin and Homan near Homan/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Homan/Washington due to street blockage near Homan/Washington.

Southbound buses will operate via Homan, Franklin, Kedzie, Madison and Homan including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via Homan, Warren, Kedzie, Franklin and Homan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change between Grand and Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays from Grand & Damen due to a track condition; board all trains on the Forest bound-bound side at Grand, Chgo, Division & Damen

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to Grand and Damen due to a track condition; board all trains on the Forest bound-bound side at Grand, Chicago, Division and Damen.

Trains, in both directions, are running on the same track between Grand and Damen stations.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
